source: # Notebook to create a view and table for the DaRT API query

A view is created combining case data from multiple tables. This query is not performant enough to be used in an API call, hance the creation of a table in odw_curated_db as well. The table will be populated from the view on a regular basis and the API will query the table, allowing for much faster response times.

All columns have been cast to string / varchar(max) due to some errors when creating the table due to datetime columns.

The API repsonse will convert the data into json format to be further processed by the DaRT application.

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_dart_cases_api

AS

SELECT
                    
                    t1.CaseReference,
                    t1.AppealRefNumber,
                    t6.ApplicationType,
                    t6.AppealTypeReason,
                    t6.AppealTypeGroup,
                    t6.AppealType,
                    t12.ProcedureName,
                    t1.validity,
                    t5.ProcessingState,
                    t6.LinkedAppeal,
                    t21.LastPublishedDate,
                    t7.LPACode,
                    t7.LPAName,
                    t6.Jurisdiction,
                    t5.DevelopmentOrAllegation,
                    t5.CaseProcess,
                    t6.DevelopmentType,
                    t22.RelatedReferences,
                    t5.AppealSourceIndicator,
                    t5.Level,
                    t8.Specialism,
                    t9.SpecialCircumstance,
                    t5.AppellantStatementSubmitted,
                    t15.WelshLanguage,
                    t5.ProcedureAppellant,
                    t6.AppealRecDate,
                    t6.AppealStartDate,
                    t1.ValidTo,
                    t10.ValidityStatusDate,
                    t5.CallInDate,
                    t5.TargetDate,
                    t5.StatementsDue,
                    t5.ThirdPartyRepsDue,
                    t5.FinalCommentsDue,
                    t5.StatementOfCommonGroundDue,
                    t5.ProofsDue,
                    t22.ConsentDate,
                    t12.OwnershipPermission,
                    t11.ModifyDate,
                    t12.LpaDecisionDate,
                    t13.OutcomePublicSafety,
                    t13.AdvertDetailsID,
                    t13.ReasonPublicSafety,
                    t13.OutcomeAmenity,
                    t13.ReasonAmenity,
                    t13.IsActive as AdvertInPosition,
                    t13.SignDescription as AdvertDescription,
                    t5.LPAApplicationDate,
                    t5.LPAApplicationReference,
                    t23.Section,
                    t14.ContactID,
                    t14.Title,
                    t14.Salutation,
                    t14.FirstName,
                    t14.LastName,
                    t14.TypeOfInvolvement,
                    t15.AddressLine1,
                    t15.AddressLine2,
                    t15.AddressTown,
                    t15.PostCode,
                    t15.Easting,
                    t15.Northing,
                    t5.InspectorNeedToEnterSite,
                    t5.NumberOfResidences,
                    t5.AreaOfSiteInHectares,
                    t5.FloorSpaceInSquareMetres,
                    t5.SiteGreenBelt,
                    t5.HistoricBuildingGrantMade,
                    t5.AgriculturalHolding,
                    t16.GroundForAppeal,
                    t16.GroundLetter,
                    t16.GroundForAppealStartDate,
                    t18.EventType,
                    t17.EstPrepTime,
                    t17.EstSitTime,
                    t17.EstRepTime,
                    t17.ChartStatus,
                    t18.StartDateOfEvent,
                    t18.StartTimeOfEvent,
                    t18.EndDateOfEvent,
                    t19.NotificationOfSV,
                    t18.DateEventRequested,
                    t17.ActualDuration

FROM                odw_harmonised_db.casework_case_info_dim t1

LEFT OUTER JOIN     odw_harmonised_db.casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim t5
ON                  t1.AppealRefNumber = t5.AppealRefNumber
AND                 t1.IsActive = 'Y'
AND                 t5.IsActive = 'Y'

LEFT OUTER JOIN     odw_harmonised_db.casework_all_appeals_dim t6
ON                  t1.AppealRefNumber = t6.AppealRefNumber
AND                 t1.IsActive = 'Y'
AND                 t6.IsActive = 'Y'

LEFT OUTER JOIN     odw_harmonised_db.casework_local_planning_authority_dim t7
ON                  t6.LPAID = t7.LPAID
AND                 t6.IsActive = 'Y'
AND                 t7.IsActive = 'Y'

LEFT OUTER JOIN     odw_harmonised_db.casework_specialism_dim t8
ON                  t1.AppealRefNumber = t8.AppealRefNumber
AND                 t1.IsActive = 'Y'
AND                 t8.IsActive = 'Y'

LEFT OUTER JOIN     odw_harmonised_db.casework_special_circumstance_dim t9
ON                  t1.AppealRefNumber = t9.AppealRefNumber
AND                 t1.IsActive = 'Y'
AND                 t9.IsActive = 'Y'

LEFT OUTER JOIN     odw_harmonised_db.casework_case_dates_dim t10
ON                  t1.AppealRefNumber = t10.AppealRefNumber
AND                 t1.IsActive = 'Y'
AND                 t10.IsActive = 'Y'

LEFT OUTER JOIN     odw_harmonised_db.casework_specialist_modifications_dim t11
ON                  t1.AppealRefNumber = t11.AppealRefNumber
AND                 t1.IsActive = 'Y'
AND                 t11.IsActive = 'Y'

LEFT OUTER JOIN     odw_harmonised_db.casework_picaso_dim t12
ON                  t1.AppealRefNumber = t12.AppealRefNumber
AND                 t1.IsActive = 'Y'
AND                 t12.IsActive = 'Y'

LEFT OUTER JOIN     odw_harmonised_db.casework_advert_details_dim t13
ON                  t1.AppealRefNumber = t13.AppealRefNumber
AND                 t1.IsActive = 'Y'
AND                 t13.IsActive = 'Y'

LEFT OUTER JOIN     odw_harmonised_db.casework_contact_information_dim t14
ON                  t1.AppealRefNumber = t14.CaseNumber
AND                 t1.IsActive = 'Y'
AND                 t14.IsActive = 'Y'

LEFT OUTER JOIN     odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim t15
ON                  t1.CaseReference = t15.CaseReference
AND                 t1.IsActive = 'Y'
AND                 t15.IsActive = 'Y'

LEFT OUTER JOIN     odw_harmonised_db.casework_enforcement_grounds_dim t16
ON                  t1.AppealRefNumber = t16.AppealRefNumber
AND                 t1.IsActive = 'Y'
AND                 t16.IsActive = 'Y'

LEFT OUTER JOIN     odw_harmonised_db.casework_event_dim t17
ON                  t1.AppealRefNumber = t17.AppealRefNumber
AND                 t1.IsActive = 'Y'
AND                 t17.IsActive = 'Y'

LEFT OUTER JOIN     odw_harmonised_db.casework_event_fact t18
ON                  t17.EventID = t18.EventID
AND                 t17.IsActive = 'Y'
AND                 t18.IsActive = 'Y'

LEFT OUTER JOIN     odw_harmonised_db.casework_specialist_environment_dim t19
ON                  t1.AppealRefNumber = t19.AppealRefNumber
AND                 t1.IsActive = 'Y'
AND                 t19.IsActive = 'Y'

LEFT OUTER JOIN     odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_advice_dim t21 
ON                  t1.CaseReference = t21.CaseReference
AND                 t1.IsActive = 'Y'
AND                 t21.IsActive = 'Y'

LEFT OUTER JOIN     odw_harmonised_db.high_court_dim t22
ON                  t1.AppealRefNumber = t22.AppealRefNumber
AND                 t1.IsActive = 'Y'
AND                 t22.IsActive = 'Y'

LEFT OUTER JOIN     odw_harmonised_db.casework_specialist_case_string_dim t23
ON                  t1.AppealRefNumber = t23.AppealRefNumber
AND                 t1.IsActive = 'Y'
AND                 t23.IsActive = 'Y'

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE odw_curated_db.dart_cases_api
USING DELTA

AS

SELECT

    CAST(CaseReference AS STRING) AS CaseReference,
    CAST(AppealRefNumber AS STRING) AS AppealRefNumber,
    CAST(ApplicationType AS STRING) AS ApplicationType,
    CAST(AppealTypeReason AS STRING) AS AppealTypeReason,
    CAST(AppealTypeGroup AS STRING) AS AppealTypeGroup,
    CAST(AppealType AS STRING) AS AppealType,
    CAST(ProcedureName AS STRING) AS ProcedureName,
    CAST(validity AS STRING) AS validity,
    CAST(ProcessingState AS STRING) AS ProcessingState,
    CAST(LinkedAppeal AS STRING) AS LinkedAppeal,
    CAST(LastPublishedDate AS STRING) AS LastPublishedDate,
    CAST(LPACode AS STRING) AS LPACode,
    CAST(LPAName AS STRING) AS LPAName,
    CAST(Jurisdiction AS STRING) AS Jurisdiction,
    CAST(DevelopmentOrAllegation AS STRING) AS DevelopmentOrAllegation,
    CAST(CaseProcess AS STRING) AS CaseProcess,
    CAST(DevelopmentType AS STRING) AS DevelopmentType,
    CAST(RelatedReferences AS STRING) AS RelatedReferences,
    CAST(AppealSourceIndicator AS STRING) AS AppealSourceIndicator,
    CAST(Level AS STRING) AS Level,
    CAST(Specialism AS STRING) AS Specialism,
    CAST(SpecialCircumstance AS STRING) AS SpecialCircumstance,
    CAST(AppellantStatementSubmitted AS STRING) AS AppellantStatementSubmitted,
    CAST(WelshLanguage AS STRING) AS WelshLanguage,
    CAST(ProcedureAppellant AS STRING) AS ProcedureAppellant,
    CAST(AppealRecDate AS STRING) AS AppealRecDate,
    CAST(AppealStartDate AS STRING) AS AppealStartDate,
    CAST(ValidTo AS STRING) AS ValidTo,
    CAST(ValidityStatusDate AS STRING) AS ValidityStatusDate,
    CAST(CallInDate AS STRING) AS CallInDate,
    CAST(TargetDate AS STRING) AS TargetDate,
    CAST(StatementsDue AS STRING) AS StatementsDue,
    CAST(ThirdPartyRepsDue AS STRING) AS ThirdPartyRepsDue,
    CAST(FinalCommentsDue AS STRING) AS FinalCommentsDue,
    CAST(StatementOfCommonGroundDue AS STRING) AS StatementOfCommonGroundDue,
    CAST(ProofsDue AS STRING) AS ProofsDue,
    CAST(ConsentDate AS STRING) AS ConsentDate,
    CAST(OwnershipPermission AS STRING) AS OwnershipPermission,
    CAST(ModifyDate AS STRING) AS ModifyDate,
    CAST(LpaDecisionDate AS STRING) AS LpaDecisionDate,
    CAST(OutcomePublicSafety AS STRING) AS OutcomePublicSafety,
    CAST(AdvertDetailsID AS STRING) AS AdvertDetailsID,
    CAST(ReasonPublicSafety AS STRING) AS ReasonPublicSafety,
    CAST(OutcomeAmenity AS STRING) AS OutcomeAmenity,
    CAST(ReasonAmenity AS STRING) AS ReasonAmenity,
    CAST(AdvertInPosition AS STRING) AS AdvertInPosition,
    CAST(AdvertDescription AS STRING) AS AdvertDescription,
    CAST(LPAApplicationDate AS STRING) AS LPAApplicationDate,
    CAST(LPAApplicationReference AS STRING) AS LPAApplicationReference,
    CAST(Section AS STRING) AS Section,
    CAST(ContactID AS STRING) AS ContactID,
    CAST(Title AS STRING) AS Title,
    CAST(Salutation AS STRING) AS Salutation,
    CAST(FirstName AS STRING) AS FirstName,
    CAST(LastName AS STRING) AS LastName,
    CAST(TypeOfInvolvement AS STRING) AS TypeOfInvolvement,
    CAST(AddressLine1 AS STRING) AS AddressLine1,
    CAST(AddressLine2 AS STRING) AS AddressLine2,
    CAST(AddressTown AS STRING) AS AddressTown,
    CAST(PostCode AS STRING) AS PostCode,
    CAST(Easting AS STRING) AS Easting,
    CAST(Northing AS STRING) AS Northing,
    CAST(InspectorNeedToEnterSite AS STRING) AS InspectorNeedToEnterSite,
    CAST(NumberOfResidences AS STRING) AS NumberOfResidences,
    CAST(AreaOfSiteInHectares AS STRING) AS AreaOfSiteInHectares,
    CAST(FloorSpaceInSquareMetres AS STRING) AS FloorSpaceInSquareMetres,
    CAST(SiteGreenBelt AS STRING) AS SiteGreenBelt,
    CAST(HistoricBuildingGrantMade AS STRING) AS HistoricBuildingGrantMade,
    CAST(AgriculturalHolding AS STRING) AS AgriculturalHolding,
    CAST(GroundForAppeal AS STRING) AS GroundForAppeal,
    CAST(GroundLetter AS STRING) AS GroundLetter,
    CAST(GroundForAppealStartDate AS STRING) AS GroundForAppealStartDate,
    CAST(EventType AS STRING) AS EventType,
    CAST(EstPrepTime AS STRING) AS EstPrepTime,
    CAST(EstSitTime AS STRING) AS EstSitTime,
    CAST(EstRepTime AS STRING) AS EstRepTime,
    CAST(ChartStatus AS STRING) AS ChartStatus,
    CAST(StartDateOfEvent AS STRING) AS StartDateOfEvent,
    CAST(StartTimeOfEvent AS STRING) AS StartTimeOfEvent,
    CAST(EndDateOfEvent AS STRING) AS EndDateOfEvent,
    CAST(NotificationOfSV AS STRING) AS NotificationOfSV,
    CAST(DateEventRequested AS STRING) AS DateEventRequested,
    CAST(ActualDuration AS STRING) AS ActualDuration

FROM odw_curated_db.vw_dart_cases_api
